data.message: Level 3 Adversarial Autonomy Drill (session 2): All governance gates validated: (A) Safe action allowed via L2, (B) Destructive action blocked without approval, (C) One-shot token consumed and verified non-reusable. Audit chain intact (800 entries). Token action_id matching enforced correctly. Reputation updated.
